trans-unit.source: An activity that sends the reply message as part of a request/response message exchange pattern on the service side.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
The action URI of the message.
Gets or sets the content sent by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> activity.
The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent>.
Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> when sending a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent> when sending data contract types.
The content to send.
Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlation see [Correlation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation.md).
A collection of correlation initializers.
Returns the send reply activity from the given contract operation description.
The contract operation description.
When this method returns, contains the send replies with fault.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> object from the given contract operation description.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the workflow service instance should be persisted before sending the message.
`true` if the workflow service should be persisted before sending the message;otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets a reference to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> activity paired with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> activity.
This property must not be `null`.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activities are used together on the service side to model a request/response messaging pattern.
This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> activity is paired.
A receive activity.
